subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brandt Snedeker, who secured the FedEx Cup with a win at the Tour Championship last weekend, has not forgotten how it felt to to be omitted from a prestigious amateur team nearly a decade ago.
snippet: Brandt Snedeker, who secured the FedEx Cup with a win at the Tour Championship last weekend, has not forgotten how it felt to to be omitted from a prestigious amateur team nearly a decade ago.
